glsa.title: tnftp: Arbitrary code execution
glsa.synopsis: tnftp is vulnerable to remote code execution if output file is not specified.

background.p: tnftp is a NetBSD FTP client with several advanced features.

description.p: The fetch_url function in usr.bin/ftp/fetch.c allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary commands via a

impact.p: A remote attacker could possibly execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
